By the time

you return to

England you'll

likely be one of

the most respected scientists in

the country.

Impossible!

Professor

Henslow must have really spoken highly of me.

At any rate, reading the Professor’s letter makes me feel that all my pain until now

has been worth it.

I’ve got to work even harder as a naturalist.

Charles Darwin, the problem child from Shrewsbury, was developing into a full-fledged scientist.

96
